cookies.title: Cookies Policy ~ Daniel Vargas
cookies.heading: Cookies Policy
cookies.caption: Explanation of the browser storage technologies used to improve your experience.
cookies.intro: On this website, danielvargas.dev, privacy and transparency are fundamental principles. This policy explains how browser storage technologies are used, including the current and potential future use of cookies and local storage.

1.title: 1. What are cookies?
1.content: Cookies are small text files that a website can store in the user's browser. Their main function is to remember certain information about the visit, such as browsing preferences or login information. Some cookies are deleted when the browser is closed (session cookies), while others remain stored for a certain period (persistent cookies).

2.title: 2. What is local storage?
2.content: Local storage, also known as localStorage, allows websites to save data directly in the user's browser. Unlike cookies, local storage has a larger capacity and does not expire automatically.

3.title: 3. What technologies are used on this site?
3.content: Currently, cookies are not used on danielvargas.dev. Local storage is used exclusively to remember the user's preferred language (key: i18nextLng), without collecting personal data or sharing information with third parties.

4.title: 4. Google Analytics
4.content: This site uses Google Analytics 4 (GA4) to obtain statistics on site usage. Interactions are recorded through anonymous events. Data is not shared with Google for advertising or product improvement purposes.

5.title: 5. Possible future use of cookies
5.content: First-party or third-party cookies could be implemented for technical or analytical purposes. Advertising cookies will not be used without the user's explicit consent.

6.title: 6. How to manage cookies
6.content: Most browsers allow you to accept, block, or delete cookies. It is recommended to consult the official browser documentation for more information.
